featuredProducts.title: Featured Products
featuredProducts.subtitle: Discover our most popular and premium spice selections

items.name: Cumin Seeds (Jeera)
items.description: Premium cumin seeds from the arid regions of Rajasthan, known for their intense aroma and earthy flavor. These seeds are carefully harvested and processed to maintain their natural oils and essential compounds.

items.name: Fennel Seeds (Saunf)
items.description: Sweet and aromatic fennel seeds with a licorice-like flavor. Perfect for digestive purposes and adding a unique taste to dishes. These seeds are known for their cooling properties and refreshing aroma.

items.name: Coriander Seeds (Dhaniya seeds)
items.description: Mild and citrusy coriander seeds that enhance the flavor of any curry. Sourced from the finest coriander plants and carefully processed to retain their natural oils and aroma.
